short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the page to your Puzlin sandlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Puzlin's aim is to help user to save time. It helps to archive, sort and share lists of its web links in a safe environment with respect for personal data. Puzlin is really a link-oriented collaborative search engine!

This add-on adds a button to your browser. When navigating on internet, click on the button if you wish to save the current link to be saved in your private space on Puzlin.com.
The link will then be added to your "sandlist" for further access and/or management.
